meanings.definition: A bus designed to operate on railway tracks.
meanings.sent1: The railbus smoothly traveled along the train tracks.
meanings.sent2: The railbus picked up passengers at the railway station.
meanings.sent3: The railbus driver joked that they were on a road made of steel.
meanings.sent4: The railbus glided on the rails like a giant metal snake.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the railbus on the tracks was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A vehicle used for transporting passengers on a railway line.
meanings.sent1: Passengers boarded the railbus for a scenic journey.
meanings.sent2: The railbus conductor announced the next stop on the railway line.
meanings.sent3: The railbus passengers cheered as they chugged along the tracks.
meanings.sent4: The railbus carried travelers like a trusty steed on the rails.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the railbus whistle echoed through the valley.
